HomePage.description_line1: In the final moment, what will your instincts choose?
HomePage.description_line2: An unknown AI will analyze your psyche.

TestPage.initial_subtitle: Connection to Earth will be terminated in 1 minute.
TestPage.initial_description: AI is initiating final data analysis of humanity...

messages: Syncing your brainwaves with the AI... (Error Rate: 42%)
Analyzing the 'pettiness' hidden in your choices.
Calculating the impact of past trauma on the apocalypse...
Probability of AI laughing at your personality: 82%... Complete.
Searching human database for similar 'attention-seeker' types...
Final survival profiling complete. Transmitting results shortly.
LoadingPage.ad_notice: Please watch a brief ad while the AI analyzes your soul.

ResultPage.percentile_text: In the moment of doom, you made a choice in the top {percentile}% of survivors.
ResultPage.alert_card_not_found: Could not find the result card.
ResultPage.alert_image_error: An error occurred while creating the image. Please try again later.
ResultPage.alert_analysis_error: An error occurred during result analysis. Please try again later.

FailPage.sub_message: Analysis interrupted due to an unexpected variable.
FailPage.ad_notice: Even at the moment of doom, humanity's commercial instincts persist.
FailPage.reboot_complete_message: System reboot complete. Ready to retry.
FailPage.click_to_view_details: Click here to view details and retry.
FailPage.hold_to_attempt_transfer: Press and hold the button to attempt data transfer...
